item.title: If You Have To Tell People You’re ‘Not The Enemy Of The People,’ You Are
item.description: The media's melodramatic displays of defiance produce the opposite of their intended effect.

item.title: Blaming Shedeur Sanders’ Late Draft Selection On ‘Racism’ Is As Dumb As It Gets
item.description: What's truly 'crazy' is automatically placing nonexistent 'racism' as the source of Sanders' fifth-round selection.
